entry.title: $2300 // Large Renovated 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Prime South Williamsburg Apartment
entry.content:
*Prime Williamsburg* Located right of the J & M Trains @ Hewes St and G @ Broadway stop making your commute a breeze, great location with many great bar's, cafe's and fine dining in the area...

Exquisite 1 bedroom Apartment! - Kitchen with stainless steel appliances including microwave, Full size common area with original exposed brick touches and small window alowing sunlight!. Gorgeous double windows in the bedroom dress the room in light - also designed with exposed brick, super spacious and with high ceilings. Large modern Bathroom with full tub and shower. Roof top access with views! Video intercom system is a plus in this very nice renovated building.


Guarantors Accepted
Pets Allowed *Upon approval
Rooftop / Roof deck
Showing by Appointment
No Fee Listing
Central Air and Heat
Video Intercom System
